display_name: Quality of Life (SHHS2): Health causes difficulty performing work
description: 4. During the past four weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your PHYSICAL HEALTH? d. Had difficulty performing the work or other activities. (For example, it took extra effort).

hybrid.LABEL: QL 4d  Difficulty in doing  work/other acti
